_header: As Holy Kirk makes mind / Intrauit ventris thalamum
_description: A macaronic carol of the Nativity — nine quatrains (abab) and two-line burden: ‘The almyghty Kyng of blys / Assumpsit carnem virginis’

Bod77.Editions:

            also Greene (1935)

             The Early English Carols.
         Oxford: Clarendon, 1935; 2nd ed., rev., Oxford: Clarendon,
            1977): 13-14.

BLEge3307.First Lines:
Holy chyrch of hym makyth myndintrauit ventris
                    thalamum…
BLEge3307.Last Lines: …he vs al to blysse bryngQui cruce mori voluit

BLHar275.First Lines:
Jhesus almyghty kyng of blysAssumpsit carnem
                    virginis…
BLHar275.Last Lines:
…He vs all tohis blys bryngeQui mori cruce
                    voluit
BLHar275.Note:
Variant text, and burden: ‘Joy we all now yn this feste / For
                        verbum caro factum est’. Transcript c. 1818 in London,  British Library Addit. 39864, f. 160.

NLS1931.First Lines:
As holy kyrke makys myndIntrauit ventris
                    thalamum…
NLS1931.Last Lines:
…He hus all to heuyn bryngQui mortem cruce
                    voluit
